list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Implement phone number validation and formatting function
- Created `phoneNumbers` method to process a list of Russian phone numbers. - Validated phone numbers to ensure they contain 7 or 10 digits. - Removed prefixes `+7` and `8`, and eliminated non-digit characters. - Returned a list of standardized phone numbers without spaces or hyphens. - Added unit tests to verify functionality and correctness of the implementation. - Organized the project as a Maven application.
